description: Title says it all, this works very well on the steam deck with a mouse and keyboard.

Very fast, nice interface all options I need. 
However, I had issues with hotkeys that are not redirected to the remote hosts. Support was answering very fast and told me that will be fixed in the next version.
summary: Awesome RDP client, feels like a native Linux mstsc version

description:
finally a working RDP solution for my KDE Neon installation. 
The interface layout and logic being close to Windows' is a big plus, less hassle.
Great app with simillar feel like native windows RDP client. Supports multi monitor setup.

As of 2021/10, this is the only app that supports proper HiDPI scaling. Remmina does client side scaling and it's very blurry.

Title bar is broken, but whatever.
summary: The only choice as of now if you need proper HiDPI scaling

description: Only client I downloaded that basically worked out of the box with no hassle and endless configs to look up. Tried many RDP clients, if you need a fast solution, try this.
I tried so much to open a .rdp file wirh remmina and I can't, but with this program I did it easyly. It have some bugs but works.

Passes through devices like webcams with ease. No other program does this besides FreeRDP itself or Reminna, but they require a lot of tinkering to do so. The dev's are also very responsive to bug reports, please please please report bugs to the email on the website if you encounter them. Its the best way to make things better
Была проблема подключения к корпоративной сети ... эта программа очень помогла!
I really like that this application is very similar to the native application from Microsoft. Work comfortably and there is support for multiscreen!
